attributes.action: Increased penalties to deter the rise in the despicable crime of pet theft
attributes.additional_details: I believe the government should now bring in sentencing that will address the rapid increase in this type of theft.
attributes.background:
The rise in pet theft in the UK is causing huge distress to animal lovers.
Current penalties simply do not reflect the severity of the impact upon families.
A strong message needs to be sent to criminals that this offence will result in a lengthy custodial sentence.
